LanguageData.Pa_RPzB6T.label: RPzB 54/1 x6
LanguageData.Pa_RPzB6T.description: 6 RPzB attached to a solid Platform.
LanguageData.Pa_RW.label: 88mm Raketenwerfer
LanguageData.Pa_RW.description: Raketenwerfer attached to a solid Platform.
LanguageData.Pa_RVW.label: Raketen-Vielfachwerfer
LanguageData.Pa_RVW.description: Raketen-Vielfachwerfer attached to a solid Platform.
LanguageData.Turret_RPzB6T.label: RPzB 54/1 MATRL
LanguageData.Turret_RPzB6T.description: Raketenpanzerbüchse 54/1 Multiple Anti-Tank Rocket Launcher, an ancient Last Ditch Effort Improvised weapon, combine 6 RPzB 54/1 to make a turret platform and slap it over a tractor or any platform for anti-tank purpose.
LanguageData.Turret_RW.label: 88mm Raketenwerfer
LanguageData.Turret_RW.description: Raketenpanzerbüchse 54/1 Multiple Anti-Tank Rocket Launcher, an ancient Last Ditch Effort Improvised weapon, combine 6 RPzB 54/1 to make a turret platform and slap it over a tractor or any platform for anti-tank purpose.
LanguageData.Turret_RVW.label: RVW MRLP
LanguageData.Turret_RVW.description: Raketen-Vielfachwerfer, reverse engineering BM-8 to fit 8cm and 88mm rockets, looks simple but is not logistic friendly at all, and it takes time to completely reload it, careful with where you are aiming with it.
LanguageData.Pa_RPzB_Crate.label: RPzB crate
LanguageData.Pa_RPzB_Crate.description: Use this to build a RPzB related turret.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_RPzB6T.label: RPzB 54/1 MRL Platform
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_RW.label: 88mm Raketenwerfer ATRL
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_RVW.label: Raketen-Vielfachwerfer MRLP
